level.text: A Notice of Agency Fund Requirements may be issued by the Commission at any time.

Any Notice of Agency Fund Requirements, once issued, shall be placed in the official docket of the Commission, and served on the affected utility, the Office of the People’s Counsel (“OPC”), and any party to the proceeding.

Any Notice of Agency Fund Requirements issued for a matter not officially docketed by the Commission shall be served on the affected utility and OPC and shall be maintained in the public records of the Commission.
